hero.title: Transform Cybersecurity Documentation into Armenian
hero.subtitle: Bridge the language gap in Armenian cybersecurity education. Help translate open-source security documentation, submit GitHub PRs, earn certificates, and build a stronger security community in Armenia.

github.title: GitHub PR Integration
github.description: Direct integration with cybersecurity projects. Submit translations as pull requests and get them merged

review.title: Security Expert Review
review.description: Community-driven security validation with cybersecurity expert reviews and feedback

certificates.title: Earn Security Certificates
certificates.description: Get verified certificates for cybersecurity translation contributions after GitHub PR merges

step1.title: Choose a CyberSec Project
step1.description: Browse available cybersecurity projects and select documentation that needs translation

step2.title: Translate & Submit PR
step2.description: Use our editor to translate content and submit pull requests to GitHub repositories

step3.title: Earn Security Certificates
step3.description: Receive certificates after your PRs are merged and build your cybersecurity reputation

community.title: Join Our Community
community.subtitle: Building Armenia's Tech Future
community.description: Every translation you contribute helps make technology more accessible to Armenian speakers. Join a growing community of developers, translators, and tech enthusiasts working together to bridge the language gap in technology education.
community.testimonial: Contributing to Armenian Docs has been incredibly rewarding. I've helped translate React documentation and earned certificates that showcase my skills to potential employers.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to continue your cybersecurity translation journey

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join the Armenian cybersecurity translation community

documentSelection.title: Select Document to Translate

documentPreview.title: Documentation Preview
documentPreview.description: This is the original documentation that needs to be translated into Armenian.
documentPreview.securityNote: Cybersecurity terminology requires consistent translation to maintain accuracy.

submitModal.title: Submit for Review
submitModal.reviewProcess: Your translation will be reviewed by cybersecurity experts

howToEarn.title: 🏆 How to Earn
steps: Get your PR merged by maintainers

verification.title: ✅ Verification
features: Each certificate has a unique code

MobileRestriction.title: Desktop Required
MobileRestriction.description: Translation tools are optimized for desktop use to ensure the best translation experience.

whyDesktop.title: Why Desktop?
whyDesktop.description: Translation work requires side-by-side text editing, detailed formatting controls, and precise review tools that work best on larger screens.

MobileRestriction.mobileActions: What you can do on mobile:
MobileRestriction.contributionNote: Want to contribute? Use a desktop or laptop computer to access the full translation platform.

FilePreview.title: File Preview
FilePreview.previewNote: This preview shows the first 5,000 characters of the file content. The full content will be available in the translation editor.

Messages.completeCertificateInstruction: Complete translation projects to earn certificates
Messages.translationEditorDescription: The translation editor requires a desktop environment for optimal text editing, review tools, and formatting controls.

alreadyTranslatedDocs.title: Already Translated Documents
alreadyTranslatedDocs.description: Access our collection of Armenian cybersecurity documentation, translated and reviewed by security experts. All translations are available for free.
